claims.claim: Uber saves $10 million per year from RPA automation
claims.quote: After three years, Uber has more than 100 automations in production, which saves Uber an estimated $10 million per year.

claims.claim: Uber Freight automated invoicing for over 80 customers across seven main portals
claims.quote: We've been able to automate invoicing for over 80 customers across seven main portals that we use daily, which raises customer satisfaction as well as decreasing errors

claims.claim: Uber Freight increased automation coverage from less than 20% to handling nearly 100 customers and shippers
claims.quote: Starting with one customer and one shipper, Uber Freight now handles invoices for nearly 100 customers and shippers

claims.claim: Uber Freight began with less than 20% invoice automation coverage two years ago
claims.quote: We began managing less than 20% of our invoices through automation two years ago

claims.claim: WEX saved $2.7M by streamlining operations with automation and agentic AI
claims.quote: Discover how WEX saved $2.7M by streamlining operations with automation and agentic AI

claims.claim: U.S. Department of Veteran Affairs reduced claims processing time from 27 days to 12 hours
claims.quote: From 27 days to 12 hours— learn how the U.S. Department of Veteran Affairs reinvented claims processing

claims.claim: Uber's advertising platform surpassed $1 billion in annual revenue run rate
claims.quote: Since launching a new Uber advertising division in 2022, the platform has already surpassed an impressive US$1 billion in annual revenue run rate.

claims.claim: Uber achieved 70% increase in speed of ad sales process
claims.quote: 70% increase in speed of Uber's ad sales process

claims.claim: Uber is intaking advertising demand 50% faster
claims.quote: Uber is now intaking advertising demand 50% faster and the speed of their end-to-end ad sales process has increased by nearly 70%.

claims.claim: Over 100 processes were moved and modernized in the cloud
claims.quote: 100+ processes moved and modernized in the cloud

claims.claim: 75+ custom dashboards were created to give teams visibility into operations
claims.quote: 75+ custom dashboards created to give teams visibility into operations
